content:
We're looking at making some significant changes to the MolecularSequence resource for the R5 ballot (content freeze in early March). Please take a look at this google doc for proposed changes and questions, and provide comments in the doc or in this thread.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gjGrE1Lzg22WlfZ0gaUB8yBnniwUW2IDaYSveDiO-98/edit?usp=sharing
Do you mind making it editable to everyone with the link?

Kevin Power said:

Do you mind making it editable to everyone with the link?

oops... done!
Let me know if you can edit it now.
